article.title: L-3 to Provide Flight Trainers to Saudi Arabia
article.text: L-3 Communications Corp., Arlington, Texas, was awarded a $48,978,323 firm-fixed-price, foreign military sales (Saudi Arabia) contract for the acquisition of three UH-60L operational flight trainers for the Royal Saudi Land Forces. Army Program Executive Office Simulation, Training & Instrumentation, Orlando, Florida, is the contracting activity (W900KK-14-C-0001).
